name: Goa Garba
address: Pejeng Kelod, Tampaksiring, Gianyar Regency, Bali 80552, Indonesia
review 1: This site has been dated for centuries. Itâ€™s surrounded by a small river & forest. You could do some 20 mins trekking in the forest & visit the temple. Baliâ€™s really great having these small places to go trekking like this. The people at the Goa Garba is also really nice & friendly.
review 2:
The truest place for those who prefer serenity.

Goa Garba is nothing short of meditative. It's a place for you to immerse yourself in nature and history.

Here, you can find historical ruins and a tiny cave for the people in the past to meditate.

Entrance ticket: Rp20.000
review 3: 30,000 IDR for foreigner entry. What a gorgeous location and ancient temple site. The view and history is amazing to learn and was off the beaten path.
review 4: Ubud's Hidden Gem. Very beautiful ancient temple.
review 5: History of JayaPangus that still exist in pejeng Gianyar pounded at 1116AD

name: Capung Asri Eco Luxury Resort
address: Capung Asri, Jalan Capung Asri, Pejeng Kelod, Kec. Tampaksiring, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80552, Indonesia
types: bed_and_breakfast, resort_hotel, hotel, spa, lodging, health
review 1: Everything from booking until the end of my stay was fantastic at Capung Asri!  Jeff and his team are amazing and every single person went out of their way to make us feel welcomed and special. The villas were clean, modern and luxurious. The view was spectacular and the food was delicious.  Staying 4 nights was definitely not long enough.  Thank you, Jeff and your whole team.  I will be back!
review 2: Capung Asri Eco Resort has left me speechless. The moment you walk into the doors you are greeted with an abundance of beauty that will have you in awe for your entire stay. The luxury and relaxation the room presents you with was unmatched throughout my entire stay in Indonesia. Complete privacy upon entering my room made me feel truly at home and allowed me to enjoy all the amenities and fully be at peace. You can tell so much thought was put into every inch of this resort, everywhere you look from the amazing tile work and statues in the pool all the way to the breathtaking art all throughout the villa. Highly recommend you indulge in the floating breakfast , the perfect way to start your day on the right foot. Jeff and the team have truly outdone themselves and made this an experience I will never forget. Also Dragon is so sweet. Miss him already. Can't wait to come back :)
review 3:
Capung Asri is simply stunning. From the moment you walk in, you instantly feel good. The amenities smell great and feel luxurious. Iâ€™m sensitive to scent and I could not get enough of all the scents around us. If you have time, the massage they offer is absolutely worth it. They were so good and I left feeling very relaxed.

The whole team truly elevates the experience. All of them are very professional, friendly and the most helpful! Tucked away outside Ubud central, the views are beautiful and relaxing. I could not have asked for a better place to relax.
review 4: Very nice quiet place outside touristic Ubud. Villa was very spacious and new. Had everything you could possibly think about including bath bombs, yoga equipment, mosquito repellent and even hats to protect from the sun. The staff is friendly and helpful. And Dragon is absolutely adorable.
review 5: We had the most incredible stay here. Jeff and his team went above and beyond to ensure we were taken care of and extremely comfortable in this villa. Iâ€™ve never experienced luxury like this before. We loved the villa so much we didnâ€™t even want to leave. The area is private but still just a short 20 minute drive into Ubud. The beds were so comfortable and the room was spacious. We had a private pool where we enjoyed a floating breakfast one morning which I would highly recommend. Out of our whole time in Bali, our experience at this villa was a highlight and we made memories that will never be forgotten. Thanks again to Jeff and his team!

name: Alam Samesta Villa
address: F8R5+23C, Banjar Lokaserana, Kec. Gianyar, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80515, Indonesia
review 1:
Probably most beautiful place where we stayed so far. Not just in a Bali. Villa is just perfect. But what makes it so special is Putu Susie, who is so kind and always smiling. She made a welcome drink for us, prepared our breakfasts with love. I loved discusions with her. She is also super nice to our kids.

We already miss you! And the villa! It is a small paradise in the middle of the rice fields with all the privacy and calm you need. And still just few minutes ride from Ubud.
review 2: This place is such a beautiful and relaxing place. The host Putu Nik, is the best host I have had the pleasure working with. His whole family that owns/runs this place are phenomenal... from cooking, cleaning, driving, massage. Just Excellent
review 3: A good place to short stay n vocation with family
review 4: First of all, beautiful villa in a peaceful context surrounded by rice fields. It is located in a village not far from Ubud, in my opinion the best city in Bali. What really stood up was Putu's figure: always kind, friendly, she would personally make breakfast for us everyday in the villa, amazing and delicious. She also let us rent a scooter for a very good price and any need we had she immediately responded. Amazing host. The day of our departure she made for us some good local food to take away to the airport, simply unbelievable, and her husband took us directly to the airport. We really felt home. The villa itself is very nice, perfect for long stays, too.
review 5: A great place to relax and excellent service.

name: Villa Damee
address: Jalan Pejeng Kelod, Banjar Kelusu, Pejeng Kelod Village, Tampasiring, Pejeng Kelod, Kec. Gianyar, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1: We were a group of 3 and stayed in this truely amazing villa. The staff made us feel home from the first second. The location was perfect for us, in an authentic local village, surrounded by rice paddies. I really loved the yoga platform (yoga matts complementary!) in the upper level of the house. And of course the hammocks, spend hours there just reading and enjoying the peaceful environment. The villa even has access to a magical river which we really enjoyed. Wayan even organised us scooters for us and a massage in the villa, which was awesome. In the villa were very helpful travel advisors for Ubud, Bali and Indonesia and traditional clothes (Kabaya & Sarongs) which we needed to enter a temple - very helpful if you travel light and don't want to buy it. Make sure you go on the complimentary village tour - so worth it! We would have never see these great places otherwise. We were riding our scooters every day, but there was a shuttle service twice a day which is great for people who like to travel around by car.
review 2: Villa Damee Is a private residence.  It is not for rent.  It is for sale -23 are and borders the Holy Pakerisan River.  Red Lotus Property - talk to Mr Gusti for more detail.
review 3: When I go to the second floor, the yoga/open area gets me. Loving it.
review 5: Enjoyed my stay. Nothing to complain about.

name: Villa Hati
address: Jl. Dewi Sri No.9, Siangan, Kec. Gianyar, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80515, Indonesia
review 1: Beautiful villa, perfect service, the owner is very friendly and accommodating. I absolutely recommend.
review 2: Awesome stay, with a great host.

name: Hura Restaurant
address: Jl. Kelusu, Pejeng Kelod, Kec. Tampaksiring, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80552, Indonesia
review 1: Easily one of the best in house restaurant Iâ€™ve ever tried, itâ€™s so good it could be a standalone restaurant by itself! Their menu features a ton of spices, ingredients and produce grown in their very own herb and fruit garden, and the rice is harvested from their paddy field. Thatâ€™s why the nasi goreng tastes phenomenal, on top of the great culinary skills of the Hura team. Service was fantastic, and the Ayam Betutu was also a big score. Happy to come back anytime!
review 2: An enchanting atmosphere to have breakfast or dinner, incredible service always ready and anticipating every need, incredible food and fresh fruit selection, i recommend getting the pancakes or mie goreng!
review 3:
They serve really delicious fruit that is sourced from their own garden, as well as some great food. Definitely check out the pancakes.

It's quite a delightful place to sit down and enjoy a meal surrounded by beautiful scenery!
review 4: Incredible Indonesian breakfast overlooking sustainable farms and a tropical forest. Had a smoothie bowl and Nasi Goreng (Indonesian Fried Rice). The staff was lovely, amenable, and attentive. The food was very tasty!
review 5: Great service and lovely staff who are around to make us feel welcomed. We got breakfast here every morning and whatever we ordered was always delicious. Special shout out to the chicken and waffles ðŸ§‡

review 1: There are many little lanes and gangs that lead to this beautiful river.  Follow the kids.  They play at the river.  Go exploring.  I have spent many an afternoon bathing in the pure waters and finding little pathways on foot to this magnificent place.
